channel.title: Make Priest Social
channel.description: Priest has some support abilities, but it's main ability is to talk to the dead. The main reason why I want to change it is because of the cult. The class that the priest currently becomes is the ritualist. It would make more sense if the priest became an apostle because then they can still talk to the dead. In regards to other things not much changes. Princess is unaffected and the duchess/seeker aren't any more interested in social vs support much of the time. This also makes there be 3 convertible social and 3 convertible support.

item.title: Make Priest Social
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Troll box is fun. Im not really sure how to use it right but I’m sure others will figure it out as the meta develops. Especially since the scorned will have it.

Read full topic

item.title: Make Priest Social
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
Sketch:

Scorned and Fool to social

Once they have troll box, yes, but until then, they are not social enough.

item.title: Make Priest Social
item.dc:creator: Sketch
item.description:
Seconded.

Also, change the Scorned and Fool to social. No need for a Wildcard type right now.

item.title: Make Priest Social
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Priest has some support abilities, but it’s main ability is to talk to the dead. The main reason why I want to change it is because of the cult. The class that the priest currently becomes is the ritualist. It would make more sense if the priest became an apostle because then they can still talk to the dead. In regards to other things not much changes. Princess is unaffected and the duchess/seeker aren’t any more interested in social vs support much of the time. This also makes there be 3 convertible social and 3 convertible support.
